team6.finalproject

Class UltrasonicPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • team6.finalproject.PausableTimerListener
      • team6.finalproject.UltrasonicPoller

  • public class UltrasonicPoller
extends PausableTimerListener
    A lejos.utility.TimerListener-based ultrasonic sensor reading fetcher. Gets a reading from 0 to 2.55 metres from an ultrasonic sensor and returns the reading as centimetres.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Andrei Ungur

    • Constructor Detail

      • UltrasonicPoller

        public UltrasonicPoller(SampleProvider us,
                        float[] usData,
                        EV3UltrasonicSensor inputSensor)
        Constructor for Ultrasonic Poller.
        Parameters:
        us - the SampleProvider that fetches the readings
        usData - the float array in which the SampleProvider stores its data

    • Method Detail

      • timedOut

        public void timedOut()
        Fetches sampler data for every Timer loop. Multiplies the ultrasonic sensor's readings by 100 to display more readable int values.

      • getDistance

        public float getDistance()
        Gets the distance value fetched by the SampleProvider.
        Returns:
        the float value of the distance read by the ultrasonic sensor

      • enable

        public void enable(boolean on)
